footerText: Â© {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the origins, benefits, and sacred process of the Ayahuasca ceremony.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced spiritual guides who will accompany you on your healing journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Find all the recommendations here.
contactCommunityText: Connect with us on our social networks to stay updated on our upcoming ceremonies, events, and healing content.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral psychoactive beverage from the Amazon, made from the mixture of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis). It has been used for centuries by indigenous peoples for medicinal, spiritual, and ceremonial purposes.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca acts on the central nervous system, inducing altered states of consciousness that allow for deep introspection, emotional release, and spiritual connection. Its effects can lead to significant revelations and lasting personal transformations.
spiritualMasterDescription: The medicine acts as a key that opens the doors to your own inner wisdom. The true master is within you, and Ayahuasca helps you connect with that inner source of knowledge and healing. We are just a bridge for you to connect with your own healing.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: It provides a clear vision of your life path, helping you release mental blockages and find answers to your deepest questions.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the release of emotional traumas and repressed pain, promoting deep emotional healing and physical well-being.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It expands consciousness and strengthens the feeling of unity with nature, the universe, and your own divine essence.
groupCeremonyDescription: Participate in a shared experience where the collective energy enhances individual healing. An ideal space to connect with others on the same path.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, designed to address your specific needs in a contained and exclusive environment.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming and past events. Each ceremony is a unique opportunity for transformation.
guidesPageSubtitle: Experienced facilitators committed to your healing process, creating a safe and respectful environment.
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson Alfaro brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
preparationProcessDescription: The days before, you begin to cleanse your body and mind.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The sacred moment of encounter with the medicine.
experienceProcessDescription: A deep journey of introspection, visions, and emotional release.
integrationProcessDescription: Applying the lessons learned to your daily life for lasting change.
dietSubtitle: For at least one week before and after the ceremony, it is crucial to follow a specific diet to purify the body and enhance the effects of the medicine.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mindset is fundamental. Here are some recommendations:
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Clearly reflect on what you wish to heal or understand during the ceremony.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the experience.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring to the surface deep and sometimes difficult emotions. It is a process of purification. Trust the medicine, trust the guides, and trust yourself. Allow whatever needs to be released to flow, with the certainty that it is part of your healing.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: To ensure your comfort and well-being during the experience.
essentialsList: Change of clothes for the next day
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your sacred space.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back to El Arte de Sanar.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Join our community to begin your transformation.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to access exclusive content, reserve your spot in ceremonies, and receive guidance on your spiritual path. It's free and only takes a minute.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. This information is confidential and allows us to ensure the ceremony is safe for you. Please answer honestly.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing your information. You can review your answers below.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (heart, blood pressure, respiratory, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants, anxiolytics, or supplements)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications and supplements.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions (schizophrenia, bipolarity, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please provide details about your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other psychoactive substances?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you seek to heal, understand, or explore...
errorRequiredDetails: Details are required if you answered 'yes'.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your information has been saved securely.
questionnaireErrorDescription: Could not save your answers. Please try again.
dialogSuccessDescription: Your questionnaire has been successfully submitted. We recommend you now review the preparation guide to get ready for your experience.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content, users, and settings.
themeTabDescription: Customize the application's color palette in real-time. Changes are applied live for preview.
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the changes.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users in the application.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! I'm inviting you to complete your health questionnaire for the El Arte de Sanar ceremony. It's a fundamental step for your safety and well-being. You can complete it here:
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the answers provided by the user.
noAnswersSubmitted: No questionnaire submitted by this user yet.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all conversations held with the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full history.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, I am the spiritual guide of El Arte de Sanar. How can I help you on your path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies scheduled at this moment.
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the details of this ceremony.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. You can still edit it later.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will hide the ceremony from the main lists but it will not be deleted. You can reactivate it later.
ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in the past events section.
errorFinishingCeremony: Could not mark ceremony as finished.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
editGuideDescription: Update the information for this guide.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide's profile.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
editHeroVideoDescription: Replace the main background video of the page.
selectNewVideo: Select a new video to upload
